      • setupWithList

        public void setupWithList(java.lang.String listName,
                          java.util.ArrayList<RetailerLocation> points)
        Set up the table to use the given list of points instead of a CSV.
        Parameters:
        listName - The name of the list loaded.
        points - the list of RetailerLocations to display in the table.

      • addRetailer

        public void addRetailer()
        Creates a pop up to get the data for a new Retailer Location. If valid data is entered the Retailer is added, if it is not a duplicate.
